definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: Tender strips of chicken marinated with paprika, chilli, cumin and other spices.
sentences.chinese: 嫩雞肉條，用紅辣椒，幹辣椒，孜然等香料醃製。

sentences.english: Each slice is carefully seasoned, then slow roasted.
sentences.chinese: 每片肉條都經仔細醃漬，然後慢烤而成。

sentences.english: The noodle should be stir-fried with Chinese dried mushroom, dried shrimps, fried eggs, pork strips and spring onion.
sentences.chinese: 炒粉絲的配料有冬菇，蝦米，炒雞蛋，豬肉條和蔥。

sentences.english: She had two big packages of sirloin strips in her purse.
sentences.chinese: 她把兩大盒牛裏脊肉條藏在錢包裏。

sentences.english: I think beef stroganoff is very good today, sir.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲今天的牛肉條不錯。

sentences.english: How do you find the beef stroganoff?
Slowly and conscientiously he ate all of the wedge-shaped strips of fish.
sentences.chinese: 他認真地慢慢兒把那些楔形的魚肉條全都吃了。

sentences.english: Slowly and conscientiously he ate all of the wedge shaped strips of fish.
sentences.chinese: 他認真地慢慢兒把那些楔形的魚肉條全都吃了。

definition: Cantonese poached chicken, known as "white cut chicken"
